title: Market Research Survey
description: Gather insights about market trends and consumer preferences

intro.title: Market Research Survey
intro.description: Thank you for participating in our market research survey. Your feedback will help us better understand consumer preferences and market trends. This survey should take approximately 5-7 minutes to complete.

location.title: Location
location.description: Please enter your city and country

purchase_frequency.title: How often do you purchase products in this category?
purchase_frequency.description: Please select the option that best describes your purchasing habits

important_features.title: Which features are most important to you?
important_features.description: Please select all features that are important to you when making a purchase decision

brand_awareness.title: Which brands are you familiar with in this category?
brand_awareness.description: Please select all brands that you recognize

brand_preference.title: Which brand do you prefer in this category?

other_brand.title: Other Brand
other_brand.description: If you selected 'Other', please specify your preferred brand

satisfaction_rating.title: How satisfied are you with current offerings in the market?
satisfaction_rating.description: Please rate your satisfaction on a scale of 1-5, where 1 is 'Very Dissatisfied' and 5 is 'Very Satisfied'

price_sensitivity.title: How important is price in your purchasing decision?
price_sensitivity.description: Please select the option that best describes the importance of price to you
enum: Extremely important - I always choose the lowest price
Very important - Price is a major factor but not the only one
Moderately important - I balance price with other factors
Slightly important - I'm willing to pay more for quality
Not important - I don't consider price in my decision

purchase_channels.title: Where do you typically purchase products in this category?
purchase_channels.description: Please select all channels that you use

information_sources.title: Where do you get information about products before purchasing?
information_sources.description: Please select all sources that you use

improvement_suggestions.title: What improvements would you like to see in products in this category?
improvement_suggestions.description: Please share your suggestions for how products in this category could better meet your needs

new_features.title: Are there any new features or innovations you would like to see?
new_features.description: Please describe any new features or innovations that would enhance your experience with products in this category
new_features.placeholder: I would like products to have...

future_trends.title: What trends do you think will shape this product category in the future?
future_trends.description: Please share your thoughts on future trends in this category
future_trends.placeholder: I think future trends will include...

contact_permission.title: Future Contact
contact_permission.description: May we contact you for future market research opportunities?

thank_you.title: Thank You!
thank_you.description: We appreciate your valuable feedback. Your input will help us better understand consumer preferences and market trends. As a token of our appreciation, you will be entered into a drawing for a $100 gift card.
